ever_circling_iterator

Iterator which ever circles through a range.

Synopsis 

template<typename Iterator>
struct ever_circling_iterator
      : public detail::iterators::iterator_base< ever_circling_iterator< Iterator >, Iterator >
{
  // ...
};
